Title: dictIsIn
Description: Checks the ancestor of a key through the whole hierarchical chain in the dictionary.

dict_name — Name of the dictionary. String literal.child_id_expr — Key to be checked. Expression returning a UInt64-type value.ancestor_id_expr — Alleged ancestor of the child_id_expr key. Expression returning a UInt64-type value.
0, if child_id_expr is not a child of ancestor_id_expr. UInt8.1, if child_id_expr is a child of ancestor_id_expr or if child_id_expr is an ancestor_id_expr. UInt8.
